results.name: places/ChIJ60ae2urSpw0R25KUNm6Gcwg
results.formattedAddress: Rue Abou Abdellah Nafii, Casablanca 20250, Morocco

displayName.text: Bank Of Africa, Agence Al Massira, Maarif.

text.text: The staff, particularly the client service representative, is friendly and approachable, which is a positive aspect of this branch. However, the bank’s system seems to be perpetually down, creating a frustrating experience for customers. Clients are forced to wait for extended periods without being able to complete their transactions. This recurring issue reflects poorly on the bank’s efficiency and reliability. It’s essential for the management to address these system problems to ensure smoother operations and better customer service.

originalText.text: The staff, particularly the client service representative, is friendly and approachable, which is a positive aspect of this branch. However, the bank’s system seems to be perpetually down, creating a frustrating experience for customers. Clients are forced to wait for extended periods without being able to complete their transactions. This recurring issue reflects poorly on the bank’s efficiency and reliability. It’s essential for the management to address these system problems to ensure smoother operations and better customer service.

text.text: The worst, very unfriendly customer service. If you don’t like your job just go find another job.

originalText.text: The worst, very unfriendly customer service. If you don’t like your job just go find another job.

text.text: For a complaint about a staffing bug, I've been struggling for more than 3 months

originalText.text: Pour une réclamation d'un bug de dotation ca fait plus de 3 mois que je galére

text.text: NO SYSTEM!!! If you plan to open an account there... RUN AWAY!! Impossible to withdraw my money for a week!!.. Official excuse: “no system”… What a shame for such a bank I am withdrawing all my BMCE accounts as soon as possible.

originalText.text: PAS DE SYSTÈME!!! Si vous comptez y ouvrir un compte.. FUYEZ!! Impossible de retirer mon argent depuis une semaine!!.. Excuse officielle : « pas de système »… Quelle honte pour une banque pareille je retire tous mes comptes de la BMCE dès que possible.

text.text: Non-professional service, for a period of 48 hours as specified by the advisor, and after 9 days I have not yet received the requested document 😕

originalText.text: Service non professionnel, pour un délai de 48h comme précisé par le conseiller, et après 9j je n'ai pas encore eu le document demandé 😕

text.text: My dad had an account with them. He passed away and I wanted to take the money he had in his account by inheritance I submitted all the documents they asked for and I talked to the director of banque. The process took two months after I visited the agency seven time because the staff they don't know what to do also the process is so stupid and so long and staff work there makes it worse. If you have money don't put them in this bank. They make it easy when you want to open an account or make a deposit but the service or if you need help with something there nobody going to help.

originalText.text: My dad had an account with them. He passed away and I wanted to take the money he had in his account by inheritance I submitted all the documents they asked for and I talked to the director of banque. The process took two months after I visited the agency seven time because the staff they don't know what to do also the process is so stupid and so long and staff work there makes it worse. If you have money don't put them in this bank. They make it easy when you want to open an account or make a deposit but the service or if you need help with something there nobody going to help.

text.text:
Have you ever heard an agent at a bank say “get out of my house”? after refusing to let a newly arrived customer pass through your place? you who waited more than 20 minutes? WELCOME TO THE AGENCY OF THE BANQUE POPULAIRE ROMANDIE DE CASABLANCA. I was told to "see what I can do against her", an attitude devoid of any form of professionalism. What makes this situation even more disturbing is that wearing my veil was inappropriately mentioned during the exchange, suggesting discrimination based on my appearance.

Despite this, no apology was offered to me, and the staff clearly showed a complete lack of empathy and consideration for my experience, as well as defying me that no action could be taken against him and continued what they were doing without any respect.

It is essential that all customers, without distinction, are treated with dignity and respect.

originalText.text:
Avez-vous déjà entendu un agent dans une banque qui vous dit «sors de chez moi»? après avoir refusé de laisser faire passer un client fraîchement arrivé à votre place? vous qui avez attendu plus de 20 minutes? BIENVENUE À L'AGENCE DE LA BANQUE POPULAIRE ROMANDIE DE CASABLANCA . On m'a rétorqué de « voir ce que je peux faire contre elle », une attitude dénuée de toute forme de professionnalisme.Ce qui rend cette situation encore plus troublante, c'est que le port de mon voile a été mentionné de manière déplacée au cours de l'échange, suggérant une discrimination basée sur mon apparence.

Malgré cela, aucune excuse ne m'a été présentée, et le personnel a clairement montré un manque total d'empathie et de considération pour mon expérience, en plus de me défier qu'aucune mesure ne pourra être prise à son égard et continue ce qu' il faisait sans aucun respect.

Il est primordial que tous les clients, sans distinction, soient traités avec dignité et respect.

text.text:
Personally, I think that there are many points to improve, notably awareness of the role of the banker and a sense of service as well as customer relationship management to improve the customer experience. I believe this is the basis in this sector of activity.

Unfortunately, during your visit you will notice that the staff of this agency always seem overwhelmed by back office tasks. So, at a simple different request, he sends you back to come back another day as if it's an unpleasant and additional task for him that he didn't plan to do.

And the worst thing is that if you want to get the information by phone it's impossible. No one answers telephone calls to the agency's landline at any time of the day and to all its numbers.

A back and forth which is unpleasant and which wastes time for everyone but above all the relationship of trust which is supposed to be established with the banker.

To the wise...

originalText.text:
Personnellement, je pense qu'il y a bien des points à améliorer notamment la sensibilisation au rôle du banquier et le sens du service ainsi que  la gestion de la relation clientèle pour améliorer l'expérience clients. Je crois que c'est la base dans ce secteur d'activité.

Malheureusement, à votre passage vous allez constaté que le personnel de cette agence semble toujours débordé par des tâches en backoffice. Du coup, à une simple demande différente, il vous renvoie pour revenir un autre jour comme si c'est une tâche désagréable et supplémentaire pour lui qu'il n'a pas prévu de faire.

Et le pire est que si vous voulez avoir l'information par téléphone c'est impossible. Personne ne répond aux appels téléphoniques au fixe de l'agence à tout moment de la journée et à tous ses numéros.

Un va et vient qui est désagréable et qui fait perdre du temps pour tout le monde mais surtout la relation de confiance qui est sensée être établie avec le banquier.

A bon entendeur..

text.text:
I thought it was a modern bank with real added value in the customer journey, particularly thanks to the digital advances of their platform. Unfortunately, from a customer relations point of view we could hardly do worse, especially for customers who do not live in Morocco. Contacting the agency is a real ordeal: the phone never picks up, the advisors leave their cell phones with you but very rarely respond (with endless delays). When your advisor is on vacation or overwhelmed, he or she refers you to the agency director. This promises to process your requests then blocks your number... Cutting short any hope of communication.
Only small mishaps that say a lot about the level of respect for customers and the values ​​of the bank (of the agency at least). For me, this will be enough to explore the market and change banks.

originalText.text:
Je pensais que c'était une banque à l'air du temps avec une vraie plus-value sur le parcours client, notamment grâce aux avancées digitales de leur plate-forme. Malheureusement, d'un point de vue relation client on peut difficilement faire pire, surtout pour les clients n'habitant pas au Maroc. Le contact avec l'agence est un vrai calvaire : le téléphone ne décroche jamais, les conseillers vous laissent leur mobile mais ne répondent que très rarement (avec des délais interminables). Lorsque votre conseiller est en congés ou dépassé, il vous renvoie vers la directrice d'agence. Celle-ci ​vous promet de traiter vos demandes puis bloque votre numéro... Coupant court à tout espoir de communication.
Que de petites mésaventures qui en disent long sur le niveau de respect des clients et les valeurs de la banque (de l'agence du moins). Pour moi, ce sera suffisant pour sonder le marché et changer de banque.

text.text:
A disaster for this agency, to be avoided.
I've been stuck for over a month, I've done everything possible to resolve the problem but to no avail.
An irresponsible pseudo director, who can't even resolve a small system problem to resolve the situation.
Truly a shame for the BCP.

originalText.text:
Un catastrophe cette agence , à éviter.
Je suis bloqué depuis plus d' un mois , j ai fais l impossible pour régler le problème mais en vain.
Une pseudo directrice irresponsable, qui n arrive même pas a régler un petit problème de système pour débloquer la situation.
Vraiment une honte pour la BCP.

text.text: An agency of M..... I have been waiting for at least 1h30mn. The agents talk on the phone constantly. One of them went outside to continue talking to his beloved 😧 A service from the Third World. Sorry that we still find this kind of service in Morocco.

originalText.text: Une agence de M..... Je suis en attente depuis au moins 1h30mn. Les agents parlent au téléphone sans cesse. Un d'eux est sorti dehors pour continuer à parler à sa bien-aimée 😧 Un service du Tiers-Monde. Désolé qu'on trouve encore ce genre de service au Maroc.

text.text:
I requested a withdrawal of a small amount and the cashier refused (because I have the account in another agency) even though I have every right to withdraw my money from any agency in Morocco.
Lousy and arrogant cashier

originalText.text:
J'ai demandé un retrait d'un petit montant le caissier à refuser (cause j'ai le compte dans une autre agence ) alors que j'ai tout le droit de retirer mon argent de n'importe quel agence au maroc.
Caissier Null et arrogant

text.text: I always call the number provided for information but no one answers the phone. Please reinforce this point. On the other hand, when I show up at the agency, the account manager is professional and friendly.

originalText.text: J’appelle toujours au numéro indiqué pour avoir des renseignements mais personne ne réponds à l’appareil. Merci de renforcer ce point. Par contre, quand je me présente à l’agence , le chargé de clientèle est pro et sympa.
